unnormalised: Hey, I saw your post about medical bills. Just wanted to say, always double-check the numbers. My bill had charges for 2 MRI scans when I only had 1! And they billed me Rs. 8000 extra for a "consultation" I never got. Luckily, after 3 calls and emailing them my UHID number, they corrected it. Saved me a cool Rs. 10,000. So yeah, verify every single number!
normalised: Hey, I saw your post about medical bills. Just wanted to say, always double check the numbers. My bill had charges for two M-R-I scans when I only had one! And they billed me rupee eight thousand extra for a "consultation" I never got. Luckily, after three calls and emailing them my U-H-I-D number, they corrected it. Saved me a cool rupee ten thousand. So yeah, verify every single number!
